name: Home Alone 2: Kevin's Dream
overview: Kevin's Home Alone again - and this time he's dreaming up an incredible adventure! At least this time Kevin's safe asleep in bed, but he's dreaming of... AAAHHhh! Harry and Marv! Those two bumbling burglars keep showing up in the darndest places. In this wild and wacky trip through slumberland, anything can happen - and it will! Kevin dreams of being up in the air, at the circus, inside his favorite video games, in outer space, in some crazy mechanical contraption, and somewhere you've never even dreamed of! Can you help Kevin keep his dreams from becoming a nightmare?
